meanings.definition: The craft or occupation of a stonemason.
meanings.sent1: Stonemasonry requires skill and precision to shape stones.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful stonemasonry on the cathedral walls impressed visitors.
meanings.sent3: The stonemasonry joked that they were 'rock stars' in their trade.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to stonemasonry was as solid as the stones she worked with.
meanings.sent5: The stonemasonry workshop echoed with the sound of chisels against stone.

meanings.definition: The work or product of a stonemason.
meanings.sent1: The stonemasonry displayed in the garden was admired for its craftsmanship.
meanings.sent2: The historic building showcased intricate stonemasonry details.
meanings.sent3: The stonemasonry seemed to have a personality of its own, almost talking to visitors.
meanings.sent4: The stonemasonry stood strong against the test of time, a testament to the mason's skill.
meanings.sent5: The stonemasonry added a touch of elegance to the architecture of the city.
